snippet: Rage comics, using a combination of browser-based editing tools, offers an outlet for all the seething that comes from dealing with stupid behavior.
abstract: Rage comics, using a combination of browser-based editing tools, offers an outlet for all the seething that comes from dealing with stupid behavior; genre of Internet humor continues to grow nearly five years after its obscure beginnings, with thousands of rage comics being posted daily, many from people with little to no artistic ability.
lead_paragraph: Rage comics, using a combination of browser-based editing tools, offers an outlet for all the seething that comes from dealing with stupid behavior.

headline.seo: Rage Comics Turn Everyday Stress Into Laughs
headline.main: Put Your Rage Into a Cartoon and Exit Laughing
headline.print_headline: Put Your Rage Into a Cartoon and Exit Laughing
